alert.note: Alert for Bastrop (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 25 at 7:03PM CDT until April 25 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN BASTROP AND CENTRAL LEE COUNTIES... At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Circle D-KC Estates, or near Bastrop, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Fedor, Paige, Circle D-KC Estates, Camp Swift, Knobb Springs, Bastrop State Park, Blue, McDade, Loebau, Hills, Lincoln, Manheim and Buescher State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
